name: TAKE IT! (Grafuzen)
description:
Hi! Here's Grafuzen.
This is my really first game, designed to be played when you have to wait and you only have your phone in the pockets.
In "Take It!" you control a monster eating paratroopers, hot air baloons and planes to gain points... but watch out for the bombs!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
